Air Purification System: Integrate an air purification system into the ceiling fan that can remove pollutants and allergens from the air, improving indoor air quality.
LED Lighting: Equip the ceiling fan with LED lights that can be programmed to change colors and brightness, providing a stylish and energy-efficient lighting solution.
Smart Features: Add smart features to the ceiling fan, such as the ability to turn it on and off with a smartphone app, set timers, or adjust speed settings.
Multi-Directional Fan: Design a ceiling fan that can rotate in multiple directions, allowing users to direct airflow to different parts of the room.
Built-In Dehumidifier: Incorporate a built-in dehumidifier into the ceiling fan, which can help reduce humidity and prevent mold growth in the room.
